findings.title: Validator key distribution not enforced on-chain
findings.description: The bridge only checks signature count (5/9) but doesn't verify that validators are from different organizations. A single entity controlling 5 keys can bypass the threshold.
findings.impact: If validators are concentrated, compromise of one entity = complete bridge takeover.
findings.recommendation: Track validator organizations on-chain. Require signatures from N different organizations, not just N signatures.

findings.title: No withdrawal delay or dispute period
findings.description: Withdrawals are processed immediately once threshold signatures are provided. No delay period for community to detect fraudulent withdrawals.
findings.recommendation: Add time delay (24-48h) for large withdrawals to allow fraud detection.
